name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 815 McBride Blvd, New Westminster, BC V3L 2B9

featured_reviews.review_id: This place is just group of people who talk comment on you in their language..... today we had a worst experience in last 5 years of visiting this store ..... we ordered a hot chocolate through drive thru it was just hot water my daughter went inside to ask for the a another one the lady Hajira was rude and she said she gave a new drink to my daughter but she just gave the same drink kid got scared and came out and then I went to to get it replaced she added tons of sugar and said I made take it now!!!!! I asked her for return then she spoke to one of her colleague and started cursing us in Hindi language but unfortunately we know this language too........ never going back to this location bad customer service no expected by such a big chain ......as a change they should not comment on other change needed

featured_reviews.review_id: Really poor service. Went to drive thru and ordered 2 junior chickens, one proper meal with fries. When we went to takeout window we waited and then were told to park and waited for another hour. On finally receiving we saw it was missing straw and a junior chicken. Perfect place to ruin a meal and your mood . Zero Stars. Left left

featured_reviews.review_id: I go to McDonald's store. Food is always fresh and hot. Always have the desserts available. Customer service is great all the time. Love it when it checks off all your criterias
featured_reviews.review_text: I go to McDonald's store. Food is always fresh and hot. Always have the desserts available. Customer service is great all the time. Love it when it checks off all your criterias

featured_reviews.review_id: I know it's supposed to be fast food,  but it wasn't. 15 minutes for my order and only 2 other customers inside. Focus seemed to be on Drive-thru only. The person at the counter was less than cordial. No explanations, no thank you.
featured_reviews.review_text: I know it's supposed to be fast food,  but it wasn't. 15 minutes for my order and only 2 other customers inside. Focus seemed to be on Drive-thru only. The person at the counter was less than cordial. No explanations, no thank you.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Late afternoon on a Sunday and the drive through was backed up, so I opted to park my car and go inside.

"Service" was non-existent. I get that it's a fast food gig, but it really seemed like the staff just didn't want to bother making an effort. Guests were ignored when they approached the counter and I saw multiple incorrect or incomplete orders while I waited.

And on that note, fast doesn't describe my experience at all. I waited 8 minutes for a coffee and a cheeseburger.

McD's is seldom my first choice but in the future this location will probably be my last.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I went through Drive-Thru.
A customer ahead of me was handed a coffee and put it in his vehicle. After a minute or so, he handed the cup and was handed an obviously different cup of coffee (the first one was a holiday cup. The second one wasn't.)
When I pulled up, the shift supervisor (based on their uniform) handed me a coffee that looked to be the same as the first coffee the gentleman in front of me received. I asked the employee if that was the case and she confirmed that to be true. I, admittedly rather abruptly, demanded she dump that out and give me a fresh cup of coffee.
That was a massive FoodSafe violation (I used to be in food service and was a FoodSafe invigilator for many years) as I have no way of knowing if he added something that I might be allergic to in it.

I have half a mind to call the city of New Westminster to let them know about this as she clearly didn't think there was anything wrong with handing a customer food that was handed back by another customer. If I were a secret shopper, that might have immediately resulted in a call from city health inspectors.

Because of this experience, I *STRONGLY* encourage anyone who comes here to either think twice about it or make sure they modify every item they order so that they're assured they receive food that isn't rejects from a custom before them.

featured_reviews.review_id: A typical average Mcdonald's. The renovations make it nice and it looks more like a cafe upstairs that's pretty cozy. Food was typical mcdonald's food. A new discovery is to order a double filet o fish and put a packet of honey in the middle for a sweet and savory delight. You have to ask for condiments like ketchup here cuz they are not self serve sadly.

featured_reviews.review_id: This location is close to my home, therefore I visit very often. However, the service and food are very terrible. Coffee never tastes same. Sometimes taste okay, sometimes tasted very bad. They passed me a cup of coffee with a broken lid, and coffee dropped into my car. Last week, I ordered two bagels, both over cooked and already burned. This night, I visited and order a ice cream cone. I saw staff just put my ice cream cone on the side, and were talking for mins. There was no other customers, they just stand there. When the give the ice cream to me,  the ice cream was already melted.
